definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

sentences.english: The trumpet shall resound, and the Lord shall descend.
sentences.chinese: 號筒聲響應我救主再降臨。

sentences.english: And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.
sentences.chinese: 拿著七枝號筒的七位天使，預備好了要吹號。
